description: Number of 4-valent (or quartic) graphs with n nodes.
comments: Because the triangle A051031 is symmetric, a(n) is also the number of (n-5)-regular graphs on n vertices. [From _Jason Kimberley_, Sep 22 2009]
references: R. C. Read and R. J. Wilson, An Atlas of Graphs, Oxford, 1998.
links: M. Meringer, Erzeugung Regulaerer Graphen, Diploma thesis, University of Bayreuth, January 1996. [From Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Sep 25 2010]
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Quartic Graph.
formula: Euler transform of A006820 - _Martin Fuller_, Dec 04 2006
crossrefs: 4-regular simple graphs: A006820 (connected), A033483 (disconnected), this sequence (not necessarily connected).
author: R. C. Read (rcread(AT)math.uwaterloo.ca)
extensions: a(17),a(18),a(19), a(21) from _Jason Kimberley_, Sep 2009 and Oct 2011
